meanings.sent1: The farm had many mares grazing in the pasture.
meanings.sent2: The mares in the race were all very fast.
meanings.sent3: The mares enjoyed running freely in the meadow.
meanings.sent4: The mares galloped gracefully across the field.
meanings.sent5: The mares neighed happily as they played together.

meanings.sent1: She woke up screaming from the terrifying mares she had.
meanings.sent2: The mares haunted her dreams every night.
meanings.sent3: The spooky mares made her jump in her sleep.
meanings.sent4: The mares in her mind were scarier than any movie.
meanings.sent5: The mares left her feeling scared and anxious upon waking.

meanings.definition: A large, dark area on the surface of the moon
meanings.sent1: The astronauts observed the mysterious mares on the moon's surface.
meanings.sent2: The telescope revealed the vast mares on the lunar landscape.
meanings.sent3: The aliens on the moon loved to hide in the mares.
meanings.sent4: The mares on the moon looked like giant shadows from afar.
meanings.sent5: The mares on the moon created an eerie contrast to the bright stars.
